example.en: I will have been staying in this hotel for one month next Sunday.

example.en: He lives in a house far from the village.

example.en: No, I cannot let you in, there's one person too many.

example.en: Students often find it very difficult to understand a lecture in a foreign language.

example.en: How tall do you think my daughter will be in three years?

example.en: What time do you leave home in the morning?

example.en: I wish people would stop saying things in ways that crush young dreams.

example.en: I specialize in medieval history.

example.en: I was just reading up about the other cases in the area that you're headed to.

example.en: It is said that his father is in hospital now.

example.en: One day, grandpa caught her with a man in the laundry.

example.en: The fruit that we produce results, not in sorrow, but in great joy.
example.vi: Bông trái mà chúng ta gặt hái không phải là nỗi đau buồn mà là niềm vui lớn.

example.en: Would you not prefer to live in the city, surrounded by real people?

example.en: With this system a protection circuit has been built in.

example.en: But she can't have been in two places at the same time, can she?

example.en: We can play the original in one ear, and a new recording in the other.

example.en: And specifically, I'm interested in collecting my own stories,

example.en: In November 1994, while engaging in the preaching work, Ella suddenly felt very weak.
example.vi: Tháng 11 năm 1994, đang lúc làm công tác rao giảng, chị Ella đột nhiên cảm thấy quá yếu mệt.
